bookCover.coverDescription: An Interactive book on parts of a computer for grade 1 students.

params.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support this audio

params.text: The human body has different parts:
Different parts of a computer are given below:
It is a Printer. It is used to print text, pictures and greeting cards on papers.
Speakers produce sound. You can listen to songs, rhymes and audios.
A microphone is an input device used to record sound and store voice into a computer.
System unit (CPU) is the brain of the computer.
Mouse is an input device used to point at items shown on the monitor.
A keyboard is an input device used to type different characters.
A monitor is an output device that shows us results on the screen.

questions:
1) *Keyboard* is an input device that is used to type alphabets.
[Mouse / Printer / Keyboard]

2) Without *monitor* we cannot see any results on the screen.
[speakers / monitor / microphone]

3) *CPU/System unit* is the brain of the computer.
[CPU / Monitor / Mouse]

4) *Mouse* is used to select items shown on the monitor.
[Speaker / Mouse / System unit]
